name: Space Rocks (itch) (Mykre)
description:
Simple adaption of the classic game, Still in Development and features will be added as i move along. This game is based on code and examples found all over the net and across different engines. It was used as a Test to get back into the Godot Game engine after the Version 4 release.

Use the A and D Key to rotate left and Right.
Use the W and S Key to thrust forward and Backward.
Use the Space or Left Mouse Button to Fire.

In Trouble press R to Reset.
